samples.name: Linear History
samples.description: A simple repository with 4 commits in a linear sequence. Perfect for beginners to understand basic Git workflow.

samples.name: Feature Branches
samples.description: A repository demonstrating branch creation and merging. Shows how feature branches integrate back into the main branch.

samples.name: Complex Merge History
samples.description: A more complex repository with multiple feature branches, merge commits, and a release tag. Great for exploring advanced Git workflows.
